title:
Piecewise linear constitutive relations for stretch-limited elastic
  strings
authors: Roger Bustamante, K. R. Rajagopal, Casey Rodriguez
abstract:
This study proposes a simple and novel class of stretch-limiting constitutive
relations for perfectly flexible elastic strings drawing from modern advances
in constitutive theory for elastic bodies. We investigate strings governed by
constitutive relations where stretch is a bounded, piecewise linear function of
tension, extending beyond the traditional Cauchy elasticity framework. Our
analysis includes explicit solutions for both catenaries and longitudinal,
piecewise constant stretched motions.
